ygData.subject: Must read!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: This is an atempt to make us a tad more organise We will from now onwards, be 100% base on Innoruuk. Anyone who disagree, give me your address and I ll force
ygData.messageBody:
This is an atempt to make us a tad more organise

We will from now onwards, be 100% base on Innoruuk. Anyone who disagree, give me
your address and I'll force you to agree with a parang.

This is the short list of characters we have, please fill it up.

> Name Character Class Race Level Location
> -----------------------------------------------------------------------
> Sereph Sereph Bard Half Elf 3 Greater Faydark
> -------------------------------------------------------------------------
> LKW Ziltus Wizard High Elf 12 Freeport
> -----------------------------------------------------------------------
> Alex Yiyang Monk Human 17 Freeport
> --------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Entreri Radeon Monk Human 4 Freeport

Groups will be form base on levels. Each member in the group should not have a
level difference of more than 3/4 from each other. This is to make grouping
worth doing for the high level guys, and the lower level ones.

If possible, please summit a character report every friday night indicating your
current level/where you are/what items you've found etc.........

So far, here are the groups:

Group 1, Level 15-19 -> Alex(Tank)
Group 2, Level 10-14 -> LKW(Magic support)
Group 3, Level 5-9 -> ???
The rest who are still very low level-> Enteri(Tank), Sereph(Secondary Support)

Anyone who change server, or propose a change of server without a valid reason
will be forced to treat everyone on the list to lunch, for a week, so, don't
anyhow change servers.
